text: Darvel Football Club are a Scottish football club based in the town of Darvel, Ayrshire. Nicknamed "The Vale" or "The Juniors", and formed in 1889, the club play at Recreation Park (on Irvinebank Road), and currently, the . Reaching the final of the 1975-76 Scottish Junior Cup (beaten 3-0 by Bo'ness United) has been the most illustrious point in the club's history.OVD Cup Record (1968 to present) Darvel won the Ayrshire District League title in 2016–17 to gain promotion to the West Super League First Division (now renamed as the West Championship), the second tier of the SJFA West Region. The team was managed from June 2013 to November 2017 by Scott Clelland. On 14 February 2019, Darvel announced that Michael Kennedy would be the new manager for the season 2019–20.https://www.facebook.com/darveljuniorsfc/posts/2159627330965346/ == Players == === Current squad === ==References== == External links == * Facebook * Twitter Category:Football clubs in Scotland Category:Scottish Junior Football Association clubs Category:Association football clubs established in 1889 Category:Sport in East Ayrshire Category:1889 establishments in Scotland Category:Darvel Category:West of Scotland Football League teams
